summary: Adds a sound effect to the Barenziah gem when nearby.
descriptionHtml:
There had been a few occasions that I would walk right by a gem without realizing it, only to discover this after returning to a specific location for whatever reason.  Now with this mod, I will know I am near one.

I created this mod to eliminate the need to use mods that give the exact location for each Barenziah gem.  What this mod does is use a simple sound effect (similar to what the nirnroot does) when your near a gem so you will be sure to pick it up without the need for the quest marker cheat.

Available on the Workshop as well:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=33752375

==INSTALL==
Install to your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder or use NMM

==UNINSTALL==
to remove simply delete the \"Barenziah.esp\"  or use NMM

===============================
Check out my other mod Better Fences
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17735
author: Scamish76
